elements.text: Your living room is cluttered, so you decide to organize it today. You are soon feeling extremely frustrated at the mess your family has made. Your daughter yells from another room to ask you for help with something, and you close your eyes and...

elements.name: Messy Living Room_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
